comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

i was on habbo when mozilla crashed and when it got restored 


Actual results:

the popup habbo window shows tab
when i opened a tab and closed it using that popup window,automatically the tab bar disappered..and returned to normal behaviour...


Expected results:

the popup window never shows tab
comments.creator: kuldeepdhaka9@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
(In reply to Simona B [QA] from comment #2)
> Reporter - any updates?

while i was on habbo.com i was playing in a new popup window,
suddenly firefox crashed and when the popup got restored i saw that there were tab like normal window.in popups no tab are possible.using that defected popup i opened a new tab,i got opened and when i close that tab,after that the defected popup got converted into normal behaviour popup.no new tab option were there.this is all i know.
comments.creator: kuldeepdhaka9@gmail.com
comments.author: kuldeepdhaka9@gmail.com
